storyInfo: While acting independently, Serpilia encounters the local residents. Elsewhere, a conversation about the future of the monastery is unfolding.

attributes.content: (Raimund's acting all shifty...)
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: (What is it he can't tell me right now? Something that has to wait until after dark?)
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: (I don't get it, but whatever. He can do his own thing.)
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: (It's already so late, I'm only now bringing the food over... Seniora Lemuen must be starving by now. And, these portions are tiny.)
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: (Be patient, stomach! Stop growling already! Didn't you eat just a minute ago?!)
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: (I really hope I can feast one day, just eat all I want without worry.)
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Wh-Who's there?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I know you're here! Who are you?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Who's hiding over there?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Even if you keep quiet, I, I already saw you! You aren't from the abbey!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Come out! If, if you don't, I'm gonna call the others overâ€“ ...I mean, I'm gonna pull the trigger!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Alright, alright. I'm coming out.
Hah, guess I messed up...
You sure have sharp eyes. Was it the light from my wings? I knew it, it's way too easy to pick out a Sankta, what with everyone having different wings and halos.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Good grief. And here I was thinking I wouldn't need to be all that sneaky.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I've never seen you before. Who are you?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Okay, Seniora. Let's put the gun down first. That isn't something a nice girl should be pointing at her own kind.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: You're a Sankta too. You can feel I don't have anything against you.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I am, uhh... I guess you can call me a justicebringer this time? Yeah, something like that, since I'm here to save people and all.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Fine, if you don't want to talk, I'm going to call for helpâ€“
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Woah woah, settle down there.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Mmmmph!!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: (Let go of me!)
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Sure, but you'd better not scream.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: *gasp*... *gasp*...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Sorry, didn't do a good job controlling my strength there. Are you alright?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: *cough*... *cough, cough*... Who exactly are you, and what are you after?!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: It's nothing I can't tell you. I'm looking for someone.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Another Sankta, just like me. Pink hair, probably still in a wheelchair. She's got a kind and gentle look to her, but her personality is actually anything but...
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: (Is she talking about Lemuen?!)
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Hmm? That look on your face tells me... you know who I'm talking about? My lucky day.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: The food you just brought overâ€“ who's it for? I've got a feeling you're taking it to Lemuen, right?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: (Ack?!)
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: (How did she know??)
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Haha, looks like I'm right on the money again? You really need to work on your poker face!
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: So, would you mind telling me how Seniora Lemuen has been doing?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: You'd prefer not to say, huh? Or are you not allowed to? You're hesitating, and a bit scared...
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: S-Stop it! Stop making things up!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Am I making things up? I guess you'd know.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: You seem to have a lot on your mind, which feels a little odd. How could a cloistered place like this have so much trouble?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Where is all that coming from? Are you getting into fights because there aren't many of your own kind here?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: That's none of your business.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Isn't it? Are you saying that because the patron firearm you're holding hasn't been maintained in a while, because it's rusting?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I don't mind helping you out with that. I'm pretty good at gun repair, so why don't we do a little trade? You just tell me where Lemuen is. That's all.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Why not tell me? I bet you already have an idea of who I am, right? You look pretty smart to me.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Did Laterano send you too, like Seniora Lemuen?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I was.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: That's enough small talk now. I'm a bit short on time.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: You're really not gonna tell me where Lemuen is?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: *sigh*... Well, if that's how it is, that's how it is.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Say...
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Let me take care of delivering that food for you.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: *gasp*...!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: That's that, then. Vale.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Last one. That should wrap things up.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: These people are... bandits? They sure know how to make a ruckus.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Federico, how are things on your end? I heard a whole bunch of commotion over there. You didn't blow up any buildings, did you?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I did not.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Great. Well done, I'm just wrapping up over here as well.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Thank you so much. You two are incredible...
attributes.name: ClÃ©ment

attributes.content: That should teach the robbers to behave themselves for a while.
attributes.name: ClÃ©ment

attributes.content: It sounds like this isn't the first time you've been attacked, is it?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: How often does this sort of thing come up?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: If you came from Laterano, you must know how difficult it is to travel these roads.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: If we didn't have a ride, it wouldn't have been able to get here so easily.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Nobody wants to hang around a place like this, except the truly desperate.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: As you saw, there's nothing out here in these barrenlands except this monastery. Once those thugs set their sights on us, do you expect them to give up?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: He's right. Now that it's almost winter, they'll be coming more often.
attributes.name: ClÃ©ment

attributes.content: That reminds me, didn't Benny hurt his leg last time? How's he doing?
attributes.name: ClÃ©ment

attributes.content: He's still got a bit of a limp. Only option is to tough it out.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Uh, by the way, who are these two...?
attributes.name: ClÃ©ment

attributes.content: We're, uhh, I suppose you can call us emissaries from Laterano?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Ah, guests from Laterano... How are you called?
attributes.name: ClÃ©ment

attributes.content: Executor Federico of the Laterano Notarial Hall.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Executor Richele. We have another colleague with us, but she's already one step ahead.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Senior Federico, Senior Richele.
attributes.name: ClÃ©ment

attributes.content: You don't seemed surprised.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Sure. We knew it was only a matter of time before Laterano sent another. The only question is what kind of guest we would be getting.
attributes.name: ClÃ©ment

attributes.content: I thought...
attributes.name: ClÃ©ment

attributes.content: The tall, thin, and frail middle-aged man subconsciously glances at the guns in the hands of the two Lateran visitors.
I thought the next time they sent someone it would be to hand down charges...
attributes.name: ClÃ©ment

attributes.content: Charges? What crimes have you committed?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Under the Notarial Hall's purview, most criminals see a reduced sentence upon surrendering themselves and obtaining the forgiveness of the wronged.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: S-Surrender? Sentence?
attributes.name: ClÃ©ment

attributes.content: Huh? What are you talking about?!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Hold on, Federico! We don't have a handle on the situation yet, let's not worry about that until we find Lemuen and Oren.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Sorry. We'd like to talk to the man in charge here. Do you think you could arrange that for us?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Ah, yes! Give me a second, I'll go...
attributes.name: ClÃ©ment

attributes.content: No need.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Thank you for your assistance. I would be the man you're looking for.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Sorry, I was one step too late.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Your Excellency! And, Gerald...
attributes.name: ClÃ©ment

attributes.content: Brother Gerald!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Would you be the Most Reverend Abbot of this monastery? And this, uhh, Senior Gerald, is he also a community leader?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: He is not.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Haha. True enough. I am no such important person.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I realize you must have many questions.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Please, come. Let us find a more suitable place to talk.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: ClÃ©ment, please close the gate, and don't let anyone approach, for the time being.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: But, Your Excellency...
attributes.name: ClÃ©ment

attributes.content: I'll be here.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Raimund, you keep at it.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Alright. Be careful out there, Brother.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Then, I'll be waiting for you at the door. If you need anything, feel free to call for me.
attributes.name: ClÃ©ment

attributes.content: Alright. Now, no one will disturb us.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: I am the bishop here, Stefano Torregrossa, and I also serve as abbot of this monastery.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: It is a pity that you two came such long way only to find our hospitality so lacking.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: We have no need for meaningless pleasantries.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Under the power vested in us by His Holiness, Pope Yvangelista XI, my colleagues and I came to locate two Lateran nuncios. I ask: Where are Lemuen and Oren Argiolas?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I suppose I have no choice but to tell you...
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Seniora Lemuen is currently a guest of our monastery.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: But do not worry. We would never mistreat a guest, and her safety is assured.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: What about Oren Argiolas?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The whereabouts of Senior Oren... is actually what I wanted to ask you.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Is it not the case that you arrived so quickly because he contacted the Lateran?
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: ...What?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Senior, I'm afraid your statement is inconsistent with our intelligence.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: It is our understanding that Sanctilaminium Ambrosii sent a distress message to Laterano. We dispatched two nuncios in response, and lost contact with both of them.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: And so, His Holiness sent us to find the our people and investigate the situation.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Does any of that conflict with what you know?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: We were unable to retain Senior Oren.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: By that you mean you weren't able to keep Oren restrained.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You can say that again. He was on edge the whole time.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: While 'inviting' Seniora Lemuen to remain our guest, he took advantage of the distraction and slipped out.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: We don't know what happened to him after that.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Federico.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Oren escaped, but hasn't shown himself or contacted us.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Does that ring any alarm bells for you?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You could add a little more than just 'yes.'
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: And, my becloaked friend, I can't imagine any of the ordinary residents here would be quite so in-the-know. Who exactly are you?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Think of me as the hunter here, or maybe a bodyguard. No need to worry about me.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Alright then. Uhh, we'll just run with that for now...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Set Oren aside for now. We demand a reasonable explanation for Seniora Lemuen's circumstances.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Why would a monastery need to restrict the movements of a Lateran nuncio who came to offer aid? Your answer will determine our subsequent actions.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Considering you are both Lateran emissaries, you should already be familiar with this monastery's history.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Our knowledge is limited to the information in the mission briefing.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Over a decade ago... We entered the wastes to avoid a Catastrophe, ran out of fuel, and the monastery has been trapped here ever since.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Unable to communicate with the outside world, all we could do was try to farm for ourselves. But, the soil in these parts is mostly fallow, and not much food grows these days.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: That's not all. The beasts that wander the barrens, and robbers even more vicious than beasts, all pose grave threats.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: We never had much choice...
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: So you decided to take in vagrants wandering the wastes.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: 'Take in' is far too generous a term. No, we did no such act of charity.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: We were merely accepting people who had no home to return to. There are many reasons a person can become uprooted, and we did nothing more than offer them a new place to stay.
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: Stefano...
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: A point of clarification.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: There's one thing I'd like to ascertain.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Woah, Federico, what are do...?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Hey! Don't!
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Reverend Executor! This is most unusual!
attributes.name: Abbot

attributes.content: I'm finished.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You really just went for it...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: But, this definitely something. Your Excellency, can I ask you to explain what's going on here?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: In the heart of a Lateran monasteryâ€“
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Why have we found a Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Well, I guess that's that...
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: I apologize if you find this offensive.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: But what are you doing here?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I already told you. I'm just a hunter. Gerald, the hunter.
attributes.name: Gerald

attributes.content: Unfortunately... It doesn't look like you believe me.
attributes.name: Gerald
